Publication Title: Epigenetic plasticity cooperates with cell-cell interactions to direct pancreatic tumorigenesis
Publication Authors: Cassandra Burdziak, Direna Alonso-Curbelo, Thomas Walle, José Reyes, Francisco M Barriga, Doron Haviv, Yubin Xie, Zhen Zhao, Chujun Julia Zhao, Hsuan-An Chen, Ojasvi Chaudhary, Ignas Masilionis, Zi-Ning Choo, Vianne Gao, Wei Luan, Alexandra Wuest, Yu-Jui Ho, Yuhong Wei, Daniela F Quail, Richard Koche, Linas Mazutis, Ronan Chaligné, Tal Nawy, Scott W Lowe, Dana Pe'er
Publication Abstract: The response to tumor-initiating inflammatory and genetic insults can vary among morphologically indistinguishable cells, suggesting as yet uncharacterized roles for epigenetic plasticity during early neoplasia.
